resources.string:
The board is divided into tiles, with mines randomly distributed.

To win, you need to open all the tiles that do not contain a mine.

The number on a tile shows the number of adjacent mines.

To start the game, you should click anywhere on the board. This is what the board looks like after your first click.\n\nThe next step is to look at the yellow-outlined tile. The number 1 on the tile indicates there is 1 mine adjacent to it.

Look at the adjacent tiles to see if there are any that have not been revealed yet.

You can see that there is only one unrevealed tile.

This means we can assume that tile contains a mine.
Now, to mark the tile as a mine, you need to flag it.\n\nTo flag a tile, you need to tap and hold for a short time. It will then be flagged as shown above.

There you have it!

To complete the game, you need to do the same thing for all other tiles until the only tiles that haven't been revealed are the ones with mines.

Don't reveal tiles with mines, or you'll get blown up. Have fun!
Tap to reveal\nLong press to flag
